problems.title: Josephus Problem (Recursive)
problems.description:
In the Josephus problem, N people stand in a circle and every K-th person is eliminated until one remains. Given N and K, find the position (1-based) of the survivor using recursion.

Input Format:
Two integers N and K separated by space.

Output Format:
Print the position of the survivor.
hintsList: Use recurrence: J(1,k)=1, J(n,k) = (J(n-1,k) + k-1) % n + 1.
